name: No Game (RichElieGamer)
description:
You are an adventurer that has gotten lost and found a boy in his wandering. He says he will help you get out, but you have to find five items throughout the map and return them to the quest giver. Once you return all five items, you have to find the exit somewhere in town.

Game updates will be posted as they happen.

Controls: 

Movement - Up / Down / Left / Right
Interact: Z / X / Enter
NOTE: You may have to click on the game screen to make sure that the game is the window that's highlighted. Otherwise, the controls might not work.

Credits:

Design: Eli
Art: Jade, Rekkimaru, Sondanielson, and Reyhanpanci256
Moral Support: Vova and Aura

This is my first game on GBStudio, made for the Global Game Jam 2022 with the Portland Indie Game Squad.
